title: Scutellaria californica
text:
Scutellaria californica, the California skullcap, is a species of plant <a href="Endemism">endemic</a> to California. It is found in the scrub and low elevation mountains of Northern California.
It is a small plant growing up to half a meter high, bearing small, white or yellowish <a href="Antirrhinum">snapdragon-like</a> flowers which are said to smell of <a href="apple">apple</a>s. The leaves are green and arranged oppositely on the erect stem.
